item.title: Ashlee Simpson - L.O.V.E
item.description:
작곡: Sung by
KY: 60138

(I’m talkin’ bout
love love love love)
(Love love
love love)
All my girls stand
in a circle
And clap your hands
this is for you
Ups and downs highs
and lows no matter
What you
see me through
My boyfriend
he don’t answer
On the telephone
I don’t even know
Where the hell
he goes
But all my girls
we’re in a circle
And nobody’s gonna
break through

calling me now anytime

need another one

is all good
